        public boolean canHaveAsLabel​(java.lang.String label)
        Description copied from class: DiagramComponent
        Checks whether or not this diagram component can have the given string as its label.
        Overrides:
        canHaveAsLabel in class DiagramComponent
        Parameters:
        label - The string to check with.
        Returns:

      • canHaveAsMethodName

        public boolean canHaveAsMethodName​(java.lang.String methodName)
        Checks whether the given method name is a valid method name for this invocation message.
        Parameters:
        methodName - The method name for this invocation message.
        Returns:
        True if and only if the given string starts with a lowercase letter and consists of only letters, digits and underscores.

      • canHaveAsArgument

        public boolean canHaveAsArgument​(java.lang.String argument)
        Checks whether or not the given argument is a valid argument for this invocation message.
        Parameters:
        argument - The argument to check.
        Returns:
        True if and only if the given argument has non-zero length and consists of anything but commas and parentheses.
